title: Assets
description: Manage your token assets across multiple ledgers.
authorizationsAndIssuancesComing: Authorizations and Issuances coming in Phase 2
viewAuthorizationStatus: You'll be able to view authorization status and issuance history here.

messages.activateAssetMessage: Are you sure you want to activate {{code}}? This will make it available for token issuance.
messages.pauseAssetMessage: Are you sure you want to pause {{code}}? This will temporarily disable token issuance.
messages.retireAssetMessage: Are you sure you want to retire {{code}}? This action cannot be undone and will permanently disable the asset.
messages.assetCanNoLongerBeEdited: This asset can no longer be edited. Only lifecycle actions are available.
messages.makeAssetAvailableForIssuance: Make this asset available for issuance

controls.requireAuthorizationDesc: Holders must be authorized to hold this asset
controls.clawbackDesc: Allow clawback of tokens from holders
